hero.mydesc: I create modern web applications with a focus on clean code, performance, and visual aesthetics. I specialize in React and modern JavaScript technologies.

about.aboutsub: I'm a passionate junior frontend developer with a love for creating engaging web experiences.

cleanCode.title: Clean Code
cleanCode.desc: Creating maintainable, efficient, and readable code using modern standards.

uiux.title: UI/UX Focus
uiux.desc: Designing intuitive interfaces with a focus on great user experience.

fastLearner.title: Fast Learner
fastLearner.desc: Quickly mastering new technologies and staying ahead of industry trends.

journey.title: My Journey
journey.text1: My journey into web development started with a curiosity about how websites work. Since then, I've been dedicated to learning and improving my skills every day.
journey.text2: I've completed several personal projects and freelance work, which has given me hands-on experience with modern frontend technologies. I'm now looking for opportunities to grow as part of a collaborative team.

skills.title: Skills & Technologies
skills.subtitle: Here are the technologies and tools I work with to bring ideas to life

services.title: What I Offer
services.subtitle: Comprehensive web development services to help bring your ideas to life with modern technologies and best practices.

desc.webDev: Building responsive and modern websites using the latest technologies and best practices.
desc.uiuxDesign: Creating beautiful and intuitive user interfaces that provide excellent user experience.
desc.frontendDev: Developing interactive web applications with React, TypeScript, and modern frameworks.
desc.responsive: Ensuring your website looks perfect on all devices, from mobile to desktop.
desc.performance: Optimizing websites for speed and performance to improve user engagement.
desc.api: Integrating third-party services and APIs to extend your website functionality.

projects.title: Featured Projects
projects.subtitle: Here are some of my recent projects that showcase my skills and passion for web development.

items.antools: Antools — Curated Directory of Design & Development Tools
items.zone: Zone — Virtual Reality Business Solutions & AI Consulting
items.totembo: Totembo — Premium Watches and Luxury Accessories
items.vueCinemas: Vue Cinemas — Ultimate Movie Streaming Platform
items.food100: FOOD100 — Next Level Fast Food Delivery

descriptions.antools: Find the perfect tools for your next project with Antools. Explore a comprehensive collection of over 400+ free and paid resources carefully selected for designers and developers.
descriptions.santek: A comprehensive e-commerce catalog featuring premium water-heated towel rails. The platform showcases a wide range of modern designs.
descriptions.zone: Transform your enterprise with cutting-edge VR and AI technologies. We provide innovative virtual solutions and artificial intelligence integration to drive growth.
descriptions.totembo: Discover an exclusive collection of men's and women's watches, rings, and elegant jewelry at Totembo. Shop premium brands with international quality.
descriptions.vueCinemas: Experience cinema at home with a vast selection of films, series, and cartoons. Our platform offers high-quality streaming and a personalized viewing experience.
descriptions.food100: Experience premium quality burgers and combos delivered straight to your door. Quick ordering and high-quality ingredients for the ultimate fast-food experience.

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.subtitle: I'm currently looking for new opportunities. Whether you have a question or just want to say hi, feel free to reach out!
contact.footerNote: I'm open to discussing web development projects, creative ideas, or partnership opportunities.

footer.brandDesc: Passionate frontend developer specializing in creating beautiful, responsive web experiences. Let's build something amazing together.
